Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Clifton Camp
Reviews.Content: To much to type. basiclly barely works, high interfere, 15 to 20 foot range with no walls hoorible product do not buy waste of money

Reviews.Title: would not recomend
Reviews.Author: wayne
Reviews.Content: Got this to watch my 4 year old who was moving into a big boy bed and wanted to see if he stayed in it at night. product came quick hooked it up very poor picture says night vision is not could not see anything even with night lites sound what sound if you can hear anything its garble. I would buy one of the higher priced ones or go to a store were you can see the product first hand.

Reviews.Title: Great product. Perfect for its use. Great delivery.
Reviews.Author: Jacob M Ingalls
Reviews.Content: I would definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants to buy it. For $30 I was a bit skeptical of the quality of the video. Be warned that this specific product DOES NOT record sound. A minor setback considering on the box packaged in, the otherwise was stated. Overall great video quality, came with wireless and wired camera adapter and i'll use it for a long time!

Reviews.Title: picture never got clear even with both unites in the same room!
Reviews.Author: Joel S Gordon
Reviews.Content: The nanny cam has a better video, the spy cam is crap. Would not buy another one. Tried for 2 days to get a clear video you can make out details of a room. You wont catch a shoplifter with this cam.

Reviews.Title: This product performs so poorly you have to laugh at yourself for buying it in the first place
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Believe the reviews.  I would rate this a zero if that was an option.  This product is absolutely worthless. I think if I was the vendor I would be embarrased to sell this product.  Packaging looked professional, and so I was hoping that this thing would at least work some of the time.  First clue of trouble was the camera pictured on the packaging did not match what was inside.  Camera gets "hot", quickly as described by other reviewers; much warmer than a thermal handwarmer.  The image is litterally washed out short of making out some basic details, and yes I followed the instructions to focus the receiving unit and the lens on the camera.  The system basically worked except that the quality of the image was so poor it renders the whole setup worthless.  Thank goodness for Amazons accomodating return policy, otherwise just flush $20 bucks and you will get about the same amount of satisfaction.  Do not buy or you too will be writing a review like this.  To bad though, I was really hoping this would work.  I guess I am going to have to spend more money to get a working system next time, and no I am not a competing vendor.  Just someone who hoped this would work and trying to save someone else from having to return this product.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: Shelli
Reviews.Content: Very professional company that responds quickly. I had to return this product. I could not get it to work and I do not know if it was due to our Att Uverse connection (fiber optics), by abilities in hooking it up or the product itself. The instruction were not the best but for most it probably is easy to figure out.

ProductInfo.Name: Wireless 1.2ghz 1/3" 380tvl Spy Camera Transmitter with Receiver Set-203
